metadata.title: Embrace the Lamplight of Ambition, Part 2

tracks.text: Red light rolls right over humans. Green light rolls left over avatars. Rakuro and Sunraku, Towa and Pencilgon, Kei and Katzo, Rei and Psyger-0.
A green sword-shaped tower stands behind a fountain in the middle of Eleventar. Day turns to night. Red text, Shangri-La Frontier.
Sunraku stands in the Inventoria
Pencilgon and Katzo stand back to back in the ruins.
A mail bird lands on Psyger-0's arm.
Akane, Creecrue, and Emul run at night through the barrens under a crescent moon.
Ether Reactor, Operations Unit, Golden Crystal sphere, Idols
Professor in library
Psyger-100 in Eleventar
Emul runs from SF Zoo
Bilac hammers in a forge. Amariys sips coffee. In Nephilim Hollow, Rust and Mold stand on a roof near satellite dishes.
A computer sits in the Utopia reference room.
Sunraku flies through the crystal nest fighting scorpions.
Sunraku flies through the Ruins, fighting golems.
In Nephilim Hollow, Sunraku stares up. He disappears. Kingfisher and Crimson Twinewing fly around and fight. In the red mecha, Rust screams.
A spiky golem in the ruins.
The Gatekeeper's arms glow blue.
The Golden Crystal scorpion spreads its pincers.
Akitsu Akane, a blue haired ninja girl, makes hand signals.
Sunraku stares up at the Overdress Golem
Pencilgon swings a golden spear.
Katzo red fist punches the Gatekeeper.
Psyger-0 holds a sword and takes her dark form.
Sunraku wears his helm and Gilta Brill
Clouds cover the moon.
A shadowy wolf lunges from the darkness.
Text, 37, Embrace the Lamplight of Ambition, Part 2
Lycagon lunges, Sunraku parries.
She takes a few steps, then lunges at an angle. He parries.
She strikes at the back of Lycagon's knee.
Lycagon kicks her back into rubble.
Sunraku and Lycagon stare at each other.
She growls.
Shadow pool
The shadow clone dives for Sunraku. He dodges.
He plants a foot and takes an anchored stance, swords ready.
clone disappears.
Paw swipe
He dodges. Clone charges and swipes. He parries.
Lycagon lunges from behind. He dodges.
Lycagon and Shadow Clone stand side by side. Only Lycagon Prime has white markings on her face. Clone disappears.
He looks up
Prime charges
She plants a foot, and her sword is engulfed in crimson flame.
She runs, long sword out stretched.
She strikes a paw. Critical.
Prime growls then charges
She lunges at Rei, paw outstretched.
Shadow pool behind Sunraku
The wolf lunges and swipes. He dodges.
He looks at the markings on Prime's face.
She stomps
Prime leaps back and looks at the cloud of debris.
He leaps up. Shana-Oh Incarnate. Invoke the power of a fleet-footed figure of legend to greatly increase jumping ability for a set period of time.
Cloud whisps pass over the moon
Psyger looks at Sunraku
She snarls
Psyger looks at Sunraku, then down
He equips marsh daggers
She growls
She lunges
He dodges and slides back.
He creates a yellow outline of himself.
He runs. Prime stomps on the outline.
The decoy flickers. Prime swipes a final time, and the decoy dissipates.
She looks up. The silver and gold crystals of Gilta Brill shine. Sunraku arcs over.
She begins a swipe. He mid-air jumps away, ricochets off rubble, and blasts towards her.
He punches her in the face. Strands of divinity symbols trail from the blast. Airgetl√°m, Grants bonus to damage based on luck stat when a critical hit is landed.
She recoils and recovers. He jumps back. She charges.
Paw, dodge, stomp, side step, swipe, dodge.
He runs
Clone lunges. He dodges.
Clone approaches.
Paw from behind. He parries.
He stares at Prime, then dodges Clone's lunge.
He runs as Clone lunges.
Demon King Heaven Emperor
Heaven Emperor Demon King
Anitnomy turns white. Psyger's white armor turns black.
She strikes Prime's haunches. Critical
Prime steps back and snarls.
He runs. She lunges at him. He side steps and strikes. Critical.
He runs around, parries a paw, dodges a stomp.
Clouds approach the moon
He punches Prime in the face
He ricochets off rubble. She smashes it.
Swipe, dodge
The clouds engulf the moon
The clone emerges from a shadow pool
It dives.
Inventoria
Empty MP bar
He chugs a mana potion. His MP fully recovers.
He eyes something red helmet. The ether reactor floats in front of it.
The clouds drift away from the moon
Psyger blocks Prime's strikes with her sword.
He leaps away from his decoy. Prime stomps on it.
Shiny red helmet
Shiny red legs, wings, and beak appear.
The ether reactor enters the human sized mechanical red bird.
Spelled Vermillion bird
Suzaku's eyes glow. A heads up display shows schematics and video streams from Suzaku.
Dialog, dot dot dot
She turns. Sunraku's decoy flickers.
She strikes Prime's stomach. Prime roars. Moon light shines in the sky. Rubble casts shadows across the barrens.
Dialog, dot dot dot
Suzaku spreads its wings and warms its jets
It blasts off
Suzaku soars into the sky
Psyger strikes Prime with crimson flames
Lycagon Prime leaps to the side, looks at Psyger, and growls.
Her eyes narrow.
Sunraku's decoy flickers and dissipates.
He runs towards Prime.
He blasts a giant crystal missile at Lycagon's face.
She cocks her head, and the crystal flies past, landing in a pylon
She pounces, he evades.
He runs. She pursues.
He punches the pylon
She leaps to pounce. The crystal grows, smacking her in the face.
She looks up as the clouds covering over the moon.
Suzaku soars through the clouds
From a distance, the jets look like a blue meteor, tearing through the clouds.
A wolf forms from darkness and lunges.
He leaps away from a paw.
He arcs through the air and comes down on top of Lycagon Prime, punching her in the face. She falters.
She recovers and glares at him.
She strikes Prime's neck with crimson fire. Prime snarls.
Prime slaps Psyger away with a paw. Psyger goes flying into rubble.
The Ruins of Past Glories, night time
